snippet: David Cornwell’s law firm filed papers Monday in Manhattan federal court saying that Rodriguez owes more than $380,000 related to the firm’s work fighting his suspension.
abstract: Alex Rodriguez's law firm files papers in Manhattan federal court saying that he owes more than $380,000 related to the firm’s work fighting his suspension.
lead_paragraph: David Cornwell’s law firm filed papers Monday in Manhattan federal court saying that Rodriguez owes more than $380,000 related to the firm’s work fighting his suspension.
